}}In [[The Lord of the Rings Online]], '''Atli Spider-bane''' is a [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] from [[Durin's Folk]] dedicated to fighting spiders. He travelled across [[Eriador]] to fight spiders. He aids [[Archet]]â€™s people against the spider infestation near the [[Old East Pass]] and [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]'s farm.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''A Threat from Spiders''</ref> During the [[Assault of Archet]], he assists [[Jon Brackenbrook]] and the player.

When the story reaches [[Mordor]], Atli re-appears, as he is on the hunt for the brood of [[Shelob]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Minas Morgul]]</ref>
